name: National Scholarship Program (NSP)
desc: This scholarship is provided by the Government of India to help students continue their higher education.

details.eligibility: Must be an Indian citizen and studying in Class 10–12 or graduation.
details.process: Apply online through the National Scholarship Portal (NSP).

name: State Merit Scholarship (UP)
desc: The State Merit Scholarship helps meritorious students with financial support.

details.eligibility: Minimum 75% marks in the previous exam.
details.process: Apply through the UP state scholarship portal.

name: Private Foundation Scholarship
desc: This scholarship is offered by a private foundation to support students from low-income families.

details.process: Fill the online form and upload documents.
